about_the_game:
Step into the world of arcade nostalgia with Arcade Management Simulator, a detailed simulation where you manage, expand, and transform your arcade into the ultimate entertainment hub.

Manage Your Arcade

Start with a modest arcade and steadily grow your business. Purchase and set up arcade cabinets, gacha machines, and claw machines to create a space your customers will love.

Dynamic Pricing & Gameplay

Set prices for each play session and find the perfect balance between affordability and profit. Test your luck with over 500 collectible gachas and even try your hand at the claw machines.

Sell & Trade

Sell or trade your collected gachas with customers to keep them coming back. List them online for a massive profit.

Host Events

Transform your arcade into the ultimate party destination! Host birthday parties, office gatherings, and other celebrations to bring in waves of excited guests. Enter Fever Mode, where your arcade experiences a surge in activity and doubles your earnings for the duration

Build Your Reputation

Your goal is to make your arcade the most highly-rated spot in town. Clean, repair, and upgrade your facilities to attract more customers and keep them happy.

Expand & Upgrade

Reinvest your profits to expand your arcade, add new attractions, and customize your layout. Unlock advanced machines and create a one-of-a-kind arcade experience.

In Arcade Management Simulator, every choice you make shapes your journey. Can you rise to the challenge and turn your humble arcade into the most legendary entertainment destination?

This is just the beginning we'll have more features added as development progresses.

Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6

short_description: Build and manage your dream arcade! Purchase a variety of machines, set prices, maintain them, restock gacha machines, claw machines and vending machines. Collect and trade over 500 unique gachas. Upgrade your arcade, attract customers, and become the best arcade in town.
